Method.doc:
Binds hotkeys for Cherry

Parameters:
 * mapping - A table containing hotkey details for the following items:
  * start - start the pomodoro timer (Default: cmd-ctrl-alt-C)
Method.name: bindHotkeys
parameters: * mapping - A table containing hotkey details for the following items:
* start - start the pomodoro timer (Default: cmd-ctrl-alt-C)

Method.desc: Popup an alert or notification when time is up.
Method.doc:
Popup an alert or notification when time is up.

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * None
Method.name: popup

Method.desc: Starts the timer and displays the countdown in a menubar item
Method.doc:
Starts the timer and displays the countdown in a menubar item

Parameters:
 * resume - boolean when true resumes countdown at current value of self.timeLeft

Returns:
 * None
Method.name: start
parameters: * resume - boolean when true resumes countdown at current value of self.timeLeft

desc: Cherry tomato (a tiny Pomodoro) -- a Pomodoro Timer for the menubar
doc:
Cherry tomato (a tiny Pomodoro) -- a Pomodoro Timer for the menubar
